c.x: A final judgment of conviction;
From an order made, after judgment, affecting his/her substantial rights.
The defendant has the right to appeal from the following:
A judgment of dismissal in favor of the defendant upon a motion to dismiss
An order arresting judgment or acquitting the defendant contrary to the ver
An order of the Court directing the jury to find for the defendant;
An order made after judgment affecting the substantial rights of the Pueblo
The Pueblo of Picuris has the right to appeal from the following:
A notice of appeal must be filed within ten (10) days of the entry of the f
Except as otherwise provided herein, the appeal shall be handled as under t

SWITCA will issue a written opinion or such separate opinions as required t
May dismiss the appeal;
Affirm or modify the decision being reviewed;
Reverse the decision in whole or in part;
Order a new trial; or
Take any other action as the merits of the case and the interest of justice
SWITCA shall make one of the following determinations of the appeal:
